author: Taylor Borden
title: The superintendent of Miami-Dade County Public Schools slams Fisher Island for buying $30,000 worth of antibody tests as schools work to feed 'shoeless, mask-less, hungry children'
description: Fisher Island, Florida, is the richest ZIP code in the US, with an average income among residents of $2.2 million and a median home value of roughly $3 million. On Monday, the Miami Herald reported that everyone in the exclusive enclave, including staff, can …
content:
The richest ZIP code in the US, a private island off the coast of Miami, purchased coronavirus antibody tests for every single resident and staff member in the community, The Miami Herald first reported on Monday.
The island paid a total of $30,600 for 1,800… [+2049 chars]
